UA-1.name: User Authentication
UA-1.description: Handles user registration, login, and session management.

embodiment.description: Uses Firebase for cost-effective user authentication.

UA-1.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality across both platforms.

TM-1.name: Task Management
TM-1.description: Allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks with deadlines and priorities.

embodiment.description: Uses standard React Native components for task management.

TM-1.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate data synchronization and storage.

PN-1.name: Push Notifications
PN-1.description: Sends push notifications for upcoming task deadlines using Firebase Cloud Messaging.
PN-1.verification_plan: Testing push notifications on multiple devices to ensure delivery and accuracy.

DS-1.name: Data Synchronization
DS-1.description: Syncs tasks across multiple devices using a cloud-based backend.
DS-1.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate data synchronization and storage.

UI-1.name: User Interface
UI-1.description: Provides a user-friendly interface with a clean and modern design.

embodiment.description: Uses React Native for cross-platform compatibility.

UI-1.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing with a focus group to gather feedback on the interface design.

TS-1.name: Task Sharing
TS-1.description: Allows users to share tasks with other users.

embodiment.description: Enables task sharing through the cloud database.

TS-1.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality across both platforms.
